feed.title: WatchState Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250523-42281eba
entry.content:
• b5386111 Add new generic webhook endpoint. by arabcoders
  • 82c1a8ef Update the guides pages. by arabcoders
  • 428e3eda Make it possible to cache metadata request cross users. by arabcoders
  • c053fe84 Make it possible to mark specific webhook events as generic that would trigger for all users who has the same backend setup. by arabcoders
  • d45eacdf Disable automatic release note generation and update package dependencies by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250525-c934375c
entry.content:
• 5d3d5644 When processing generic event, re-validate the metadata to prevent items which user doesn't have access to make it into his db. by arabcoders
  • 23e19f62 Support generic events more widely for plex client. by arabcoders
  • 3aef2ce9 Support generic events more widely for jellyfin&emby clients. by arabcoders
  • 3c7d1e6e Add Logger proxy class. by arabcoders
  • af688358 Document downsides of the new generic webhook system and caching behavior. by arabcoders
  • 666c6de4 Fix logged exception when a generic event trigger metadata httpException 404 by arabcoders
  • dd3833a7 When parsing webhook and requesting metadata from backend, before throwing error, check for IS_GENERIC and prevent expected error for generic events. by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250527-5df09c15
entry.content:
• 14204a51 Ignore task scheduler http log messages. by arabcoders
  • 3274b36f Update TaskScheduler status to initialize true by arabcoders
  • c854949e Refactor task runner to scheduler and update related components by arabcoders
  • 5c2203d0 Add back the pid file for runner. by arabcoders
  • 689591ba Change output verbosity to debug level in RunnerCommand by arabcoders
  • d1a607ca switch to internal job runner. by arabcoders
  • b991479e Add cache purging functionality and update UI components by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250530-6224b76c
entry.content:
• d98abf22 forgot to remove beta tag from guide. by arabcoders
  • 0dcdcc4c Added caching to webui backgrounds. by arabcoders
  • 54136826 Add help links to the default view and improve FAQ customization instructions by arabcoders
  • b0ba2e18 Deprecate old webhook endpoint in favor of the generic endpoint. by arabcoders
  • 0c3eea52 switch db to WAL mode, it's little slower, but more durable by arabcoders
  • 83e1af43 add the ability to kill process via processes page. by arabcoders
  • 3f1c8eac Fixed unformatted point in setting up Tautulli webhook by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250614-e3307c58
entry.content:
• f16cd63c restored backwards compatibility for emby 4.8.x by arabcoders
  • 833d690b relax emby version match to 4.8 by arabcoders
  • 1c6fe050 Log more data when webhook fails to be parsed or matched to a user. And identify emby clients by version. by arabcoders
  • f83b32f2 updated packages and clarified some webhooks limitations. by arabcoders
  • 10301c6b minor changelog page and packages updates. by arabcoders
  • cbc5d147 Improve the kill process, by using SIGTERM first. by arabcoders
  • fc3f41ae Better control over the scheduler restart process. by arabcoders
  • 1902ac82 Remove references to MemoryMapper in preparation to remove it later from the system. by arabcoders
  • c5040951 use SIGKILL for stopping the process. by arabcoders
  • 945d2634 packages updates. and minor UI updates. by arabcoders
  • 14a27cfb fix notification for killing a process. by arabcoders
  • 63003b91 center the kill process button. by arabcoders
